name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your new tab with atmospheric live wallpapers from STALKER2:Heart of Chornobyl,showcasing the haunting beauty of the Zone.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl Live Wallpaper: Immerse Yourself in the Zone

Transform your new tab with atmospheric live wallpapers from S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl, showcasing the haunting beauty of the Zone.

The "S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl Live Wallpaper" Chrome extension takes you into the depths of the Exclusion Zone. Featuring high-resolution visuals of eerie landscapes, decaying structures, and survival-driven action, this extension is perfect for fans of the series. Its minimalist layout enhances your browsing experience while keeping the post-apocalyptic ambiance alive.

Features include:

Live Wallpapers: Stunning scenes from Heart of Chornobylâ€™s gripping world.
Quick Website Shortcuts: Navigate to favorite sites seamlessly.
Google Search Bar: Conduct searches without leaving the immersive theme.
Step into the dark, immersive world of S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2 with every new tab, keeping the spirit of the Zone alive in your browser.
